#box plot of happiness in each region  
```{r}
happy %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=regional_indicator, y=ladder_score, fill="linen"))+
  geom_boxplot(alpha=0.4)+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 30, hjust = 1))
```

#box plot of gdp in each region
```{r}

  geom_boxplot(alpha=0.4)+

```

#scatter plot of all comparable variable.  
```{r}
library(shiny)

ui <- fluidPage(
  selectInput("x", "Select X Variable", choices = c("print the wanted column name here"), selected = "one column name")
  
  selectInput("y", "Select Y Variable", choices = c("print wanted column name here"), selected = "one column name")
  
  plotOutput("plot")
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  output$plot <- renderPlot({
    
    ggplot(data=penguins, aes_string(x=input$x, y=input$y, color="region"))+
      geom_point()+
      theme_light(base_size=18)
  
}

shinyApp(ui, server)
```

#density plot app for all numeric variable.  
```{r}
library(shiny)

ui <- fluidPage(titlePanel("Log 10 Homerange by Taxon"),
                selectInput("x", "Select Taxon", 
                            choices=c("birds", "lake fishes", "lizards", "mammals", "marine fishes", "river fishes", "snakes", "tortoises", "turtles"), selected="birds"),
                plotOutput("plot", width="600px", height="500px")
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  output$plot <- renderPlot({
    homerange %>% 
      filter(taxon==input$x) %>% 
      ggplot(aes(x=log10.hra))+
      geom_density(fill="steelblue", color="black", alpha=0.6)
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)
```
